about_the_game:
Player will receive an exterior and interior galaxy skin for all their display cases.

Once the DLC is purchased, the skins will be available to use directly on the museum display cases.

======================================================================

Pemain akan mendapatkan skin galaksi untuk eksterior dan interior.

Setelah pembelian, skin dapat digunakan langsung di etalase museum.
detailed_description:
Player will receive an exterior and interior galaxy skin for all their display cases.

Once the DLC is purchased, the skins will be available to use directly on the museum display cases.

======================================================================

Pemain akan mendapatkan skin galaksi untuk eksterior dan interior.

Setelah pembelian, skin dapat digunakan langsung di etalase museum.
name: Monster Museum - Galaxy Display Case

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Monster Museum - Galaxy Display Case

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Player will receive an exterior and interior galaxy skin for all their display cases
